title: Don't forget...
body: If you pre-ordered a limited edition Moxie Blog t-shirt and haven't paid for it yet, your shirt will be released into the wild this evening. ALSO, there are two new phlogs patiently awaiting your approval.
author: Dan

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: The phlogs? No, they're not endangered at all.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Oh, THOSE! Their numbers are dwindling quickly.

comments.author: Aaron Scott
comments.body: Has anyone noticed that if you mix up the letters of "Tarnation," you get "Tarantino?" Coincidence?

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
Hmmm...The character in "My So Called Life" that you never see, but everyone always mentions, is named "Tino." As in, (Angela to Rayanne) "Didya hear Tino is having a party on Thursday?"
Coincidence?
Probably.

If you have no idea what the hell I'm talking about, sorry, you missed out. Best. Show. Ever.
And, yes, I'm including "Cheaters."

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: Mine were sewn long ago, good buddy.

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: "Sown" would be the traditional method, but apparently I prefer the excruciating pain of needle and thread.

comments.author: Evan Erwin
comments.body:
I happily paid for mine, am waiting for it to arrive in the mail. This is then followed by a subsequent rant from my wife that consists of lines like "What the hell are you doing spending money on this."

Ah, marriage.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Ah, yes. Marital bliss. I know thee well.

comments.author: Carl
comments.body: Some times it is just better to keep the wifes a little bit in the dark about these spendings of our hard earned cash.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I get in trouble if I buy a meal at Taco Bell.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Hey now. The only reason I scold is because I bring my lunch every single day to work. And I'd much rather have taco bell than a granola bar, fruit snacks, and cheese slices.

comments.author: Rachel
comments.body: Hey, speaking of t-shirts...when am I getting mine?  I'm running out of clean clothes!

comments.author: Mark
comments.body:
Any update on the additional shipping costs for delivery to the UK?

M

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Mark: looks like it'll be about $8 to ship to the UK.
